content: **designer notes ** many people are reporting problems with the link above sometimes it works sometimes it doesn t it is a problem with the administrator of the site where the pattern resides please try again later you might get lucky because i no longer own the pattern i am unable to give it to you sometimes you can get the pattern by going to red heart com 1 and choosing free patterns direct pdf download 2 or try this one 3 one crocheter noted just in case anyone wants to know row 1-5 take 26 yards of worsted wt yarn i used an i hook since i couldn t find my j 1 http //www redheart com 2 http //www coatsandclark com/nr/rdonlyres/73826811-2fa1-4df8-b9c7-57373c9635e8/123469/ctfeb0869 pdf 3 http //www redheart com/files/patterns/pdf/ctfeb08-68 pdf
